summary: The video discusses individuals who have changed their last names to either avoid recognition or for professional reasons. It mentions Malia Obama using 'Malia Ann' for her directorial debut at the Sundance Film Festival, Angelina Jolie's birth name being Angelina Jolie Voight, Stephen 'T.I.' Gordy's real name being Stephen Gordy, Sky Blue's real name being Skylar Gordy, and Nicolas Cage's real name being Nicolas Coppola. The speaker notes that some of these individuals, referred to as 'Nepo babies,' changed their names to fly under the radar, and others did so due to personal or professional reasons, such as avoiding teasing.
keywords: Nepo babies, Malia Obama, Angelina Jolie, T.I., Sky Blue, Nicolas Cage, Sundance Film Festival, last names, nepotism, entertainment, celebrity names
creator_demographic: Age: Unknown, Gender: Unknown, Geographic Location: Unknown
